skillTree.name: Norscan Warhorse
skillTree.description: The horses of Norsca live for battle, even choosing to graze on the bones of the fallen over grass.

skillTree.name: Marauder Chariot
skillTree.description: Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.

skillTree.name: War Mammoth
skillTree.description: Tainted and savage they may be, but these behemoths remain willing to bear high-status Marauders into battle, trampling flat everything foolish enough to get in their way.

skillTree.name: The Eternal Challenger
skillTree.description: Beware drunken boasts made in sight of the Dark Gods, lest they hold you to such claimsâ€¦

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +50% for this Lord
Upgrades ability: "Hunter of Champions"\\n(affected targets cannot move)

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Juggernauts of the Sarl
skillTree.description: Towering mountains of muscle and flesh, these War Mammoths give Wulfrik's tribe the edge over all comers.

skillTree.name: Fervent Creatures
skillTree.description: Skin Wolves in the Wanderer's service enjoy speed and skill beyond even their preternatural capabilities.

effects.description: Melee defence: +15 for Skin Wolves units
Charge bonus: +15 for Skin Wolves units

skillTree.name: Hunter of Champions
skillTree.description: Cursed to wander the length and breadth of the world, his never-ending quest to challenge and best the most gifted warriors.

skillTree.name: Juggernauts of the Sarl
skillTree.description: Men as great as the beasts they bring down.

effects.description: "Wyrmpiercer" ammunition (improved anti-large) for all javelin units
Bonus vs Large: +8 for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Spearmen and all Marauder cavalry units

skillTree.name: World Walker
skillTree.description: Cursed to seek the deadliest opponents to best and kill in single combat, Wulfrik must forever walk the world.

effects.description: Immune to all sea based attrition

skillTree.name: Gift of Tongues
skillTree.description: Wulfrikâ€™s Gift of Tongues means no-one can deny him a duel, but he still delights in crude invectives to break his enemiesâ€™ spirits.

skillTree.name: Echoes of Ambition
skillTree.description: Wulfrik once pursued the path of a great warrior king, and for a time cursed the gods for denying him.

effects.description: Construction cost: -33% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
Construction time: -2 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings

skillTree.name: The Eternal Challenger
skillTree.description: Beware drunken boasts made in sight of the Dark Gods, lest they hold you to such claimsâ€¦

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +50% for this Lord
Upgrades ability: "Hunter of Champions"\\n(affected targets cannot move)

skillTree.name: Seafang
skillTree.description: There's no outrunning the terrible, flying Longship known as the 'Seafang'; once in its sights, an agonising, merciless death is your only possible destination.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Quicksilver
skillTree.description: Blink and you die.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates â€“ lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.name: Fearsome Warriors
skillTree.description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
Melee attack: +6 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
Weapon strength: +6% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
Melee attack: +8 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
Weapon strength: +12% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units

skillTree.name: Beast Slayers
skillTree.description: Delighting in death and suffering, these savage warriors follow their ignoble Lord wherever he goes.

effects.description: Missile strength: +4% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
Ammunition: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
Missile strength: +6% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
Ammunition: +20% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
Missile strength: +8% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units

skillTree.name: Unnatural Selection
skillTree.description: Only the fiercest creatures can survive the frozen north; the strongest are rounded up for war and starved into viciousness, ready for the next battle.

effects.description: Speed: +6% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
Speed: +9% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
Charge bonus: +6 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
Speed: +12% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units

skillTree.name: Frostbitten
skillTree.description: The intense cold cuts into the flesh, burning the foe's extremities until they drop off altogether!

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
Melee attack: +4 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
Weapon strength: +6% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
Melee attack: +6 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
Weapon strength: +12% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units

skillTree.name: Hail of Teeth
skillTree.description: The razor-sharp hail of the north is not the only danger in the Norscan sky â€“ its airborne beasts are just as deadly and far less predictable.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
Armour: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
Armour: +12 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
Melee attack: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units

skillTree.name: Monsters of the North
skillTree.description: Giant, deadly, and able to take orders, this Lordâ€™s monstrosities are especially terrifying and lethal.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
Melee defence: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
Melee attack: +6 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
Melee defence: +6 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units

skillTree.name: Champions of the North
skillTree.description: In spite of their savage nature, they are possessed of a savage code of conduct and form a loose brotherhood of those considered worthy.

effects.description: Armour: +12 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 10% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Hardened Hunters
skillTree.description: No beast too large, no adversary too great; no quarry - mortal or otherwise - can evade them.

effects.description: Missile strength: +12% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
Reload time reduction: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Icy Wrath
skillTree.description: The intense cold and near-constant darkness of the far north make for a certain kind of killer.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Hulks of Death
skillTree.description: The freezing darkness and stunning violence of the far north bring no small solace to those who have lost everything and wish to forget.

effects.description: Armour: +12 for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
Ward save: 8% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Stand or Die!
skillTree.description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

skillTree.name: Fight or Die!
skillTree.description: There is no other choice. There never was.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Norse Resilience
skillTree.description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

skillTree.name: Swelling of Doom
skillTree.description: Maybe it is the influence of the Dark Gods that has caused the populace to burgeon and proliferate beyond their natural bounds?

skillTree.name: Devourers of Flesh
skillTree.description: Once Wulfrik has made his infernal offerings, the mangled gore that remains is devoured by his ravenous, insatiable Werekin.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +5 for Skin Wolf Werekin
Hero capacity: +1 for Skin Wolf Werekin

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Savage Skills
skillTree.description: There's something about the harsh, unforgiving nature of northern life that makes its occupants fight harder and longer than many of their soft, southern equivalents.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Healing
skillTree.description: Something strange - something no scholar really wishes to discover - governs who dies and who lives in the warlike northern wastes.

skillTree.name: Fuelled by War
skillTree.description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

skillTree.name: Spawn of Chaos
skillTree.description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

skillTree.name: Born Warrior
skillTree.description: Born to slaughter in their Ruinous names, Wulfrik bears the Mark of the Dark Gods upon his flesh.

items.name: Sword of Torgald
items.description: Although King Torgald's blade is a prized trophy, it is also an eternal reminder of the consequences of grand proclamations afore the Gods.
